member.returns: All the users falling into specific area

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.AreaController.Post(Likkle.BusinessEntities.Requests.NewAreaRequest)
member.returns: HTTP Status of 201 code if area was successfuly created.

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.GroupController.Get(System.Double,System.Double)
member.returns: All the groups that contain this point(lat/lon) as part of their diameter

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.GroupController.GetUsers(System.Guid)
member.param: Unique identifier of the group you are getting the users from
member.returns: All the users for a specific group

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.GroupController.Post(Likkle.BusinessEntities.Requests.StandaloneGroupRequestDto)
member.returns: HTTP Code 201 if successfuly created and 500 if not.

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.GroupController.Post(Likkle.BusinessEntities.Requests.GroupAsNewAreaRequestDto)
member.param: NOTE: 'AreaIds':[1] -> NOT Required. This is not the Id of the newly created area. This is all the other area ids if we were in the range of other areas but no matter of that we decided to create new area.
NOTE: 'userId':1 -> Supposed to be the id of the user. If you pass it, you automatically get subscribed to the group you created. Otherwise, you just create it without following it.
member.returns: Uniqe identifier of the newly created group entity

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.UserController.GetUserByStsId(System.String)
member.returns: If there's such user in the system - UserDto is returned, otherwise null.

member.returns: Http.OK if the operation was successful or Http.500 if there was an error.

member.name: M:Likkle.WebApi.Owin.Controllers.UserController.Post(Likkle.BusinessEntities.Requests.NewUserRequestDto)
